alert.note: Alert for Coastal Pasco; Inland Pasco (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 4:56PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Pasco County through 545 PM EDT... At 456 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Land O Lakes, or 8 miles north of Lutz, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Port Richey, Hudson, Holiday, Jasmine Estates, New Port Richey East, Land O Lakes, Beacon Square, Trinity, Elfers, Moon Lake, Gowers Corner, Odessa, Jay B Starkey Wilderness Park, Bayonet Point and Shady Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
